channel.title: News on UCLA Artificial Intelligence & Visual Computing Lab
channel.description: Recent content in News on UCLA Artificial Intelligence & Visual Computing Lab

item.title: 2023 Siggraph papers
item.description: [2024-02-26] We have 2 papers to appear in CVPR 2024.

item.title: Amazon Award
item.description: [2024-02-16] Professor Chenfanfu Jiang awarded 2023 Science Hub awards.

item.title: 2023 Siggraph papers
item.description: [2023-10-04] We have 3 papers to appear in SIGGRAPH Asia 2023 Sydney.

item.title: Sony Award
item.description: [2023-09-15] Professor Chenfanfu Jiang awarded Sony Faculty Innovation Award.

item.title: Minchen CMU
item.description: [2023-08-20] Congratulations to Minchen Li on joining CMU CSD as a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor!

item.title: sca2023
item.description: [2023-08-20] We successfully hosted the 22nd annual Symposium on Computer Animation (SCA) at UCLA!

item.title: 2023 Siggraph papers
item.description: [2023-05-05] We have 4 papers to appear in SIGGRAPH 2023 LOS ANGELES.
[2022-05-06] We have 6 papers to appear in SIGGRAPH 2022 VANCOUVER.

item.title: IDP CIPC Codebase Released
item.description: [2021-11-10] Our codebases for IDP and C-IPC are released: IDP-Code C-IPC-Code

item.title: 2021 Outstanding Doctoral Dissertation Award
item.description: [2021-08-10] Minchen Li wins the ACM SIGGRAPH 2021 Outstanding Doctoral Dissertation Award.

item.title: ICRA Best Paper
item.description: [2021-06-04] Our paper Soft Hybrid Aerial Vehicle Via Bistable Mechanism wins the IEEE ICRA Best Paper Award on Mechanisms and Design.
